body:
Hey Guys I just bought Minecraft: Story Mode this morning and I started recording it this morning.I recommend it! I suggest playing the game first before watching any playthoughs on YouTube because it will just ruin the experience.

The animations and voice acting was insane the story line is absolutely brilliant!
Leave your thoughts underneath and my playthough will be on my channel next week :)

YouTube: youtube.com/shadowolf365
Twitter: @shadowolfyt
Twitch: twitch.tv/shadowolfyt

title: Minecraft: Story Mode!
